application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: Reason : 1 - Insufficient information has been submitted in relation to condition 11 (Landscaping) to demonstrate to the satisfaction of the Local Planning Authority that the proposed development would ensure that suitable hard and soft landscaping is provided on site in accordance with policy DM22 of the Development Management Policies Local Plan 2013.

Reason : 2 - Insufficient information has been submitted in relation to condition 13 (Landscape Management Plan) to demonstrate to the satisfaction of the Local Planning Authority that the proposed development would provide long term design objectives, management responsibilities and maintenance schedules for all landscaped areas to ensure the future success of the development including the long term aims and objectives for all the external areas in accordance with policy DM22 of the Development Management Policies Local Plan 2013.

Reason : 3 - Insufficient information has been submitted in relation to condition 14 (Biodiversity Enhancement) to demonstrate to the satisfaction of the Local Planning Authority that the proposed development would ensure adequate biological enhancements for the site in accordance with policies DM21 of the Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013).
description: Details pursuant to Conditions 11 (Landscaping), 13 (Landscaping Management Plan) and 14 (Biodiversity Enhancement) attached to planning permission P/0337/22 allowed on appeal reference APP/M5450/W/22/3299939 dated 7/12/22 for Redevelopment to provide two storey building with habitable roofspace comprising of eight flats (6 X 1 bed and 2 X 2 bed); landscaping; bin and cycle stores (demolition of existing dwelling and outbuilding)
